body.name: Coterie Newborn Diapers + Wipes Baby Kit, Size NB (3 Packs) + Size 01 (6 Packs) = 291 Diapers, Wipes Made with Plant-Based Fibers, Hypoallergenic, Designed for Sensitive Skin, Clean Ingredients
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 14 hrs 47 mins
features: THE BABY DIAPERS: Minimize leaks, blowouts, and the likelihood of diaper rash with up to 70% more liquid capacity*, up to 4x faster absorbency*, and up to 3x drier skin*. Coterie diapers for newborns are made with 25% plant-based, ultra-soft, apparel-grade materials. (*Compared to leading brands in lab testing).

THE BABY WIPES: Coterie newborn wipes are made with 99% water and 100% plant-based fibers. Each wipe is up to 30% larger*, ultra-soft, and gentle on sensitive skin. (*Compared to leading brands in lab testing).

DESIGNED FOR NEWBORNS + SENSITIVE SKIN: Our diapers and wipes are dermatologist accepted, hypoallergenic, cruelty free, made with sustainably sourced plant-based materials, and made without 200+ potentially harmful chemicals (NO fragrances, lotion, latex, rubber, dyes, alcohol, heavy metals, parabens, phthalates, chlorine bleaching, VOCs, or optical brighteners).

MADE WITH CRUELTY-FREE, PLANT-BASED MATERIALS: Coterie diapers are made with 25% plant-based materials, while Coterie diaper wipes are made with 100% plant-based, plastic-free, sustainable VEOCEL Lyocell fibers, that are FSC Verified (responsibly sourced from sustainably managed forests).

THE NEWBORN DIAPER + WIPE KIT: This baby must haves bundle contains 291 diapers [93 SIZE NEWBORN diapers (<10 lbs) + 198 SIZE 1 diapers (8-12 lbs)] and 224 wipes [(4) 56 count packs] - Diaper packaging may vary, product is the same.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Do you offer more sizes of The Diaper? We have two Newborn + Size 1 bundles stocked in our Amazon store. We also offer sizes 2 through 5 through Whole Foods Market on Amazon, based on your local Whole Foods stock. What is The Diaper made of? Sodium polyacrylate + TCF wood pulp core. Polypropylene/polyester/polyethylene backsheet. Polypropylene topsheet. Polyester high loft nonwoven acquisition layer. Polypropylene/polyethylene fastening system. Adhesives, elastics, wetness indicator. What is The Wipe made of? Substrate: 100% plant-based, plastic-free fibers, including VEOCEL Lyocell. Solution: Purified water, Tocopherol acetate, Decyl glucoside, Glycerin, Sodium benzoate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Citric acid, Silicone quaternium-17, Laureth-9 What performance and safety testing do your products undergo? Products tested by third-party lab for potentially harmful chemicals. Materials that may come in contact with skin are dermatologist tested + hypoallergenic. Performance claims based on comparison versus other similar commercially available products. Are your plant-based materials sustainably sourced? Diapers made w/ Totally Chlorine Free wood pulp from PEFC certified, sustainably managed forests (PEFC certification December 2022). Wipes made w/ FSC Certified plant-based fibers + decompose ~12 weeks (compostability tested by TUV Austria 2022).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best of all
reviews.reviewText: Best diapers and wipes of the market, really a big difference from other brands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tried them all and these are the best.
reviews.reviewText: Having been gift most popular brands these are our favorite and the best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, thick, absorbent - great baby shower gift!
reviews.reviewText: This Coterie Newborn Essentials pack is something that I would have LOVED to receive as a baby shower gift! Would I continue buying them? Probably not.That being said, the diapers are incredibly soft - including on the OUTSIDE of the diaper, which has an almost fuzzy texture. Lots of stretchy bits for a perfect leak-free fit and SUPER absorbent. The individual packs are a good size to keep out on the changing table shelf and have a perforated tear-line on the top so you're not groggily wrestling trying to open a pack during a middle of the night when your little one has a blowout!The wipes are also super soft, thick, and cushy! Perfectly moistened. They do have a little bit of a scent that I wasn't expecting - just a very light, "clean" smell, sort of like hand sanitizer. They're nested folded individually, not connected together perforated - so you pull one out and only one wipe comes out.While I love that this set comes with both the newborn AND size 1 diapers, new moms should be aware that some bigger babies might skip the NB size altogether and be in size 1 right from birth, so you may not get as much value out of this bundle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gifted and they love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are now my favorite brand for diapers and wipes. The wipes are sooo buttery soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Premium diapers and wipes at a premium price
reviews.reviewText: I'd heard about coterie from several influencers and was curious. At first glance, the diapers appear pretty basic and thin, but they're very soft and when i tested them they held a lot of moisture — more moisture than a newborn or young baby would ever produce before you'd be changing them. I love that they're made with cleaner ingredients: This is especially valuable to me during the newborn stage and early months. The fact that this set includes two sizes of diaper is very useful and I liked that it's heavier on size 1 than the actual newborn size. This would've come in handy coming home with my first two kids! One minor thing to note: while some diaper brands can distinguish between liquid and actual urine with their blue line, these diapers turn blue when exposed to any liquid.I've used a whole package of wipes now and they are STURDY. And big. So big that I feel like it's almost a waste, especially for a younger baby. I was constantly trying to contain all messes to one wipe just because I was aware of the price and how well-built they are! We usually use the Kirkland wipes, and these are even larger and thicker than those (which I thought were the perfect size!).All in all, this is a great starter set, at it's a premium price. But, you're definitely paying for quality. It's obvious a lot of thought has been put into these diapers and wipes, but if you aren't as concerned about materials (and this brand really does materials well), there are plenty of other options that work just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The softest diapers I have ever felt!
reviews.reviewText: This set would be a dream gift for any expecting parent! The variety of sizes (newborn and size one) plus the packs of wipes is the perfect mix to be set up for success during the first couple of months. The quality is unlike any other diaper we have tried! They are so soft and seem so comfortably fit while also being very effectively absorbent.I personally love a plain white diaper! Although patterns are cute, they tend to show through lighter and neutrally colored clothing and I prefer the sleekness of an all white diaper.The wipes are just as good as the diapers! They are a great size which means you end up using fewer wipes during each diaper change, and they are the perfect wetness and thickness to effectively clean their bum while keeping your hands clean, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does not protect from Leakage
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to try this product as I heard so many good reviews. Unfortunately this was not the case for me. Everytime my child does number twos, the diaper always leaks. It also does not protect against blow puts either. The only good thing from this brand are the wipes. The wipes are nice and large and durable. Other than that, I am very disappointed in this and it is definitely not worth the expensive price tag.
